title: FS: Graded EPDGs and Tolstois - PRICE DROP 6/26
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Graded EPDGs and Tolstois - PRICE DROP 6/26
posts.post_content:
Decent group of graded EPDGs and Tolstois available. Price includes tracked shipping. Will consider offers, especially if buying multiples. Will also consider trades (cash either way) for other PSA EPDGs for my set and possibly SGC ones if my current ones are low grade.

Available via PM to discuss. Thanks for looking!

Jeff

$SOLD Blackburne EPDG 
$SOLD Leifield batting EPDG 
[STRIKE]$259[/STRIKE] $229 Lumley EPDG
$SOLD Crandall with cap EPDG 
$SOLD Evans EPDG
[STRIKE]$359[/STRIKE] $299 Josh Clarke Tolstoi - Tough Print group 2 subject
$SOLD Quillen EPDG
[STRIKE]$179 [/STRIKE] $159 Randall Tolstoi - Tough Print group 2 subject
